title: 10 Game Chat Restriction
body:
I just got my first chat restriction ever and honestly I don't know if I deserve it. I was playing duo top with a friend (which isn't meta I know) but I was planning on roaming early to help other lanes. Almost immediately I was getting flamed. I remained silent for most of it up until my mid laner started cussing me out repeatedly. Malz out of no where with no provocation started cussing me out saying I made him lose his lane by not ganking (even though bard kept roaming up to him to assist him.) I admit I was getting frustrated but I was trying my best to keep a level head throughout it. Then he said he was going to report me I just responded reported. Then Bot started flaming me too even though they starting tower diving on the enemy while under leveled. At which point I just got tilted and said they didn't deserve help because they kept flaming me. I don't know why everything got so heated. Much less how this was considered to be a mutable offense in the end. Like I know I ended up losing my cool towards the end, but man I really tried to keep a level head. 
Game 1
In-Game
AllChampsCrit: your fault?
AllChampsCrit: reported
AllChampsCrit: I can't be reported for what I'm doing but okay
AllChampsCrit: You were ganked multiple times by bard and you still lost malz
AllChampsCrit: Your fault
AllChampsCrit: You let him get fed tho
AllChampsCrit: Then you got toxic at someone who did nothing to bother you
AllChampsCrit: still reported
AllChampsCrit: ye bot inted pretty much lol
AllChampsCrit: they're currently blaming me for losing lol
AllChampsCrit: I am fed and farmed
AllChampsCrit: lmao
AllChampsCrit: I didn't because the team is toxic af
AllChampsCrit: They don't deserve me to help when they're flaming hardcore 5 min in
AllChampsCrit: lol
AllChampsCrit: Malz
AllChampsCrit: I had plans to help
AllChampsCrit: Then you flamed
AllChampsCrit: There's also a reason why malz doesn't work
AllChampsCrit: Didn't stop you
AllChampsCrit: Well maybe if you didn't flame I would've helped :)
AllChampsCrit: Malz complains about trolling but runs it down top
AllChampsCrit: neat
Post-Game
AllChampsCrit: Learn how to lane
AllChampsCrit: Then try again
AllChampsCrit: lmao
AllChampsCrit: I know how to jg
AllChampsCrit: Still reported
AllChampsCrit: but okay
AllChampsCrit: oof

Unfortunately I only have what I said and I Wish I could have the entire chat. Because some of these don't follow into each other as they seem by just seeing my messages.

replies.body: dont feed into trash talk fights, i consider it griefing.

At first I was trying my best to stay out of it tbh. I kept silent and let him go on for a while. Sometimes it's just really hard to not try to defend yourself. Especially when I wasn't even doing bad yaknow?

> [{quoted}](name=AllChampsCrit,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xYZJOggv,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-05-26T07:20:54.341+0000)
>
> At first I was trying my best to stay out of it tbh. I kept silent and let him go on for a while. Sometimes it's just really hard to not try to defend yourself. Especially when I wasn't even doing bad yaknow?

yes I do know. you didnt hardcore flame like most players post about. I don't think your a typical toxic person here, but just had an unfortunate incident.

I know it's hard not to defend yourself, especially if you were supposed to win or you are having multiple games like this in a row. But it's just best to only say important info and just do emotes to communicate (I find them encouraging/funny).

I had a game where we were ahead 10+ kills. Our ADC said they liked everyone, especially me playing kindred. Wanted to back with 3.5k gold but team forces fight against a team fight comp. Throws game and we lost hard. Despite that, no one flammed except a tilted xerath who we ignored.

I've had less than a handful of games myself where I've probably typed too much (10-15 lines) trying to explain something to someone. We are all human, so it's best to just notice your behavior and don't do it again.

this is your 1st warning, so you'll be fine.
I appreciate that you're civil and genuinely someone good to talk to when it comes to this. It just bothers me because I lost my honor rank and that's going to be really rough to get back.

> [{quoted}](name=AllChampsCrit,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xYZJOggv,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-26T07:41:55.301+0000)
>
> I appreciate that you're civil and genuinely someone good to talk to when it comes to this. It just bothers me because I lost my honor rank and that's going to be really rough to get back.

yeah the honor is a bit of a bummer and a good incentive to keep being sportsmanlike. If only 3-5 than yeah that stinks.

but tbh ive never gotten anything good from them so... I think it's just a minor set back.

I dunno man I kinda enjoyed the orbs from them. I just am put off about how sudden it was. I don't really have a toxic streak or anything like that. It was just a bad game where he managed to push me to that point. I know I should've just muted my team at that point but I didn't and that's mb there. I just wish there was a less harsh punishment for a first time offense honor wise. Like even if it was just a single level drop. It'd still be better than all honor gone. It's kinda a feels bad.

That's the most untoxic chat log I have ever seen. Riot is seriously giving chat restrictions to everyone over nothing these days, judging by several posts on this forum. Pretty sad,  because it takes so long to get your honor backup. I guess they just ban you if you ever argue at all in game/post game.

wat?

person several times announced to report, said "they dont deserve my help" which the ifs is very allergic to. its a mini 0 tolerance phrase to say "you dont deserve to win/my help"

I was referring to the mid laner who was cussing me out before I even did anything. I don't know about you but I don't think most people want to help someone who is literally shitting on you even though you did nothing wrong.

literally what the boards said FOR YEARS:
"doesnt matter what anyone else did, you get judged on your behavior"
not helping is fine, saying "you dont deserve my help" isnt.

Honestly the only part I'm upset with is I lost my honor level to this. I genuinely worked hard to get there and I'm upset that after one rough game I get months if progress taken away yaknow? I'm not a toxic player in general. This game was just a really rough one. I genuinely tried to be level headed in the beginning but it's really rough sometimes. And unfortunately I'm not one of those mute all people because I don't want to miss out on any shot calls.

I would like you to look at it that way though. Are you saying you've never let someone die or not help someone because they treated you terribly? I don't know. Like if I did it for no reason then it's just straight up wrong. But I feel the way I reacted is the way any reasonable person would react. It's only human to not want to help someone who is being aggressive towards you without provocation.

i did. the more someone flames the more i ignore them and if its outside of ranked, i'll literally try to troll them.

but again: i dont say that i do. cause as long as i dont say it, the robotic system cant punish me for admitting the crime.

That's true I mean I just said it to him in all chat when he was flaming me. I know it got too heated. I just don't know if it should've resulted in an action that took away honor rank and all of that. I dunno man I just kinda wish the system was set up in a way where you don't get smacked so hard for having a one off game like this.

It was good that you stayed quiet for a while, but as soon as you started typing it was a nonstop stream of announcing that you were going to report, telling your team that you weren't going to help them, accusing others of inting, and so on. You didn't say a single positive, useful, or even neutral thing. That's not what chat is for. You earned that chat restriction, I'm afraid.
Was this the only chat-log Riot provided you?

I have similar chat logs from my perm ban.  I was informed that this is indeed extreme inflamitory behaviour.  

"Get fucked" -Riot

PS. enjoy the restriction you deserved it.  Perhaps next time treat them as a special snowflake?
